title: Elite Rider (4C265)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Game Text:	When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. While skirmishing a wounded minion, this companion is strength +2.
Lore:	“After him they rode: a long line of mailclad men, swift, shining, fell and fair to look upon.”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	Version: +.
